rows.label: tev035301_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev035301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Wikaye about her work.

rows.label: tev035301_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev035301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Wikaye if anything is troubling her.

rows.label: tev035301_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Wikaye about NLA's architecture.

rows.label: tev035301_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Wikaye about recent developments.

rows.label: tev035301_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Wikaye about recent developments.

rows.label: tev035301_SEL3021
rows.name: Ask Wikaye about recent developments.

rows.label: tev035301_MSG0001
rows.name:
I am an architect by trade, so I thought I would help
out here in New LA, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG0002
rows.name:
I suggested that they could achieve a lovely effect with
the administrative district by painting it with the same
gold foil we use on the ship...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG0003
rows.name:
But they looked at me like I was crazy, you know?
Said it would be tacky, and that no one with any
ACTUAL class would ever flash that much gold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG0004
rows.name:
I have to wonder if understanding human aesthetics is
an actually attainable goal? Especially since I guess I
possess no class of my own?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG0008
rows.name:
My little brother has no sense. Do you know that he's
been running around this death trap of a planet
without so so much as an escort?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG0009
rows.name:
And now I understand he wants to build a machine
which can heal anyone injured by the Ganglion, right?
And that he needs his research materials to do it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG0010
rows.name:
But what good will it do if he gets mortally injured
before he even finishes the machine?
I am so so scared for him...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG0011
rows.name:
He ought to be practicing playing dead so that no
indigens try to gobble him up, maybe?
That's my strategy, anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG0012
rows.name:
I may as well tell these jokes now while they're still
funny, right? One day they'll be no laughing matter![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG0017
rows.name:
I'm told we need to keep building inside the walls for
safety reasons, correct?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG0018
rows.name:
But if New LA's population starts growing, then won't
we run out of of space eventually?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG0019
rows.name:
We keep our ship afloat by altering gravity, so I told
your city planners to suspend your buildings the same
way to conserve space. Makes sense, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG0020
rows.name:
Well, they they rejected my idea summarily.
They said people needed to be able to see the sky
or...something like that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG0021
rows.name:
You humans certainly are tough to please, aren't you?
Everything has to to look good AND be efficient![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG1001
rows.name:
I know that not all humans are like those creeps,
right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG1002
rows.name:
I mean, there are plenty of people like you who look
out for the Ma-non, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG1003
rows.name:
My brother tells me that BLADE has come to his aid
countless times, which means that deep down,
your species is likely good...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG1004
rows.name:
We just need to learn to understand each other better
so tragedies like that can stop happening, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG2001
rows.name:
My poor little brother Jejebba got wounded while he
was out gathering research materials and and and
never recovered, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG2002
rows.name:
Before his final moments, he took the time to send me
a farewell message, right? And he said... He said...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG2003
rows.name: Jejebba told me that there was a BLADE there, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG2004
rows.name:
Why did this BLADE not help my brother?
Why did they leave him to die?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG2005
rows.name:
Between what happened with Alex and this,
I don't really feel safe around humans anymore,
if that makes sense?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG3001
rows.name:
Yes! I knew we could count on humans!
You are true friends, aren't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG3002
rows.name:
Er, sorry. I'm so happy my little brother made it home
safe that I guess I got ahead of myself?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG3003
rows.name:
Jejebba was out gathering research materials and got
badly wounded, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG3004
rows.name:
But thankfully a BLADE passed by and helped him get
medical attention. Isn't it wonderful?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035301_MSG3005
rows.name:
We can't judge all of humanity based on that nasty
business with Alex, I suppose. After all, most of you
humans are kind by your very nature, aren't you?[ST:wait ]
